name: Problemouse
description:
Bomberman-like 2D Puzzle Game.

Mouse is trapped in middle of most difficult mazes and he has only one tool in his disposal - bombs!

Bomb your way out to the exit, but use them wisely - their amount is limited.

  • 20 mind-twisting levels
  • Many kind of bombs and power-ups
  • Time challenges
  • Very nice graphics

Problemouse was made by team SandSquare during 2D Game Project course in TAMK Games Academy.
